jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Plan and execute the CRM activities to GO-JEK existing users using mobile engagement  and CRM tools, including Clevertap and Email Marketing platform (and SMS if necessary)  
● Evaluate the Customer Journey Map, analyze drop-offs and suggest initiatives to improve  overall customer experiences and retention  
● Ensures that the data and configuration in CRM campaigns setup are correct
● Assesses various options for optimizing and customizing the CRM system to help the  business unit & GO-JEK grow and evolve
● Attends regular meetings with various team members from business units to review  upcoming issues / planning and suggest initiative possibilities from CRM standpoints
● Do experiments and A/B testing to gain more insights on what works and what's not  
● Measure and report performance of all CRM campaigns, and assess against goals (KPIs)  
● Identify trends and insights, and optimize performance based on the insights  
● Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple  channels and customer touch points  
● Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners to ensure the achievement of business  objectives

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• BS/MS degree in marketing or a related field 
  • Proven working experience in digital marketing / CRM field (Min 2 years) 
  • Demonstrable experience in executing and managing mobile engagement and CRM tools  (MixPanel / Clevertap / Salesforce, etc) 
  • Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital CRM  campaigns that engage, inform and motivate 
  • Have basic knowledge of SQL 
  • Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking,
  • proficient in doing A/B testing
  • Experiences in well-known e-commerce / platform-based and mobile-based startup is a plus 
  • Excellent interpersonal skills with good ability to work well with others and people of  varying technical skills
  • Have the creativity, initiative and excitement about the possibilities of the CRM
  • Strong spreadsheet skills. 
  • Quick, analytical thinker, excellent business analysis and problem solving skills
  • Ability to effectively communicate complex concepts
  • Any background with CSS and HTML would be a plus.
